channel.title: RaphaCast
channel.googleplay:author: Raphael Amorim
channel.author: Raphael Amorim
channel.itunes:author: Raphael Amorim
channel.description:
Each episode is a different interview that explores software engineering, expat life, work culture, mental health and other things. Contains episodes in english and portuguese.
Find me on Twitter or Instagram by @raphamorims.
Illustration created by Leonardo Carvalho (@itsleodraws on Instagram).
Opening song "Slow Burn" by Kevin MacLeod.

item.description: Breve introdução sobre o formato da primeira temporada.

item.author: Raphael Amorim
item.itunes:author: Raphael Amorim
item.title: Ben Adam - Design, Development and Creativity (English)
item.description:
Interview with Ben Adam that works as a Designer that also codes. He works at GoDaddy, specifically in the Website Builder product. In this episode we talk about his path to learn different skill set, design concepts, development learning process and creativity.
Ben Addam twitter: https://twitter.com/benadam11 GoDaddy website builder: https://godaddy.com/websites/website-builder

item.author: Raphael Amorim
item.itunes:author: Raphael Amorim
item.title: Will Mendes Neto - Da Bahia para Austrália (Português)
item.description:
Entrevista com Will Mendes Neto - Will trabalha como desenvolvedor de software na Austrália pela Atlassian. Empresa responsável pelo Bitbucket, Jira, Trello e outras ferramentas. Will conta um pouco da sua jornada saindo da Bahia e se mudando para outro país. Abordando como lidou com a diferença de cultura no trabalho e no dia, especialmente considerando a migração da conversão/escrita no trabalho e na vida do português para o inglês.
Will Mendes Neto twitter: https://twitter.com/willmendesneto Atlassian jobs: https://www.atlassian.com/company/careers/all-jobs

item.author: Raphael Amorim
item.itunes:author: Raphael Amorim
item.title: Abenezer Abebe - Ethiopian food, NBA and Spotify (English)
item.description:
Interview with Abenezer Abebe. Abenezer works as a software engineer in spotify. In this episode we talked about a lot of different subjects such as Ethiopian food, Canada, NBA and Spotify culture. Also, we discussed about how Spotify platform teams work and how this structure affects the developers that work using the platform.
Abenezer Abebe twitter: https://twitter.com/Abenexer Spotify jobs: https://www.spotifyjobs.com

item.author: Raphael Amorim
item.itunes:author: Raphael Amorim
item.title: Fabio M. Costa - Histórias de Open Source, Mootools e Facebook (Português)
item.description:
Entrevista com Fabio M. Costa. Fabio trabalhou como Senior Software Developer no Facebook, Yipit, Mootools, Globo.com e atualmente trabalha no website builder da GoDaddy. Nesse episódio, conversamos um pouco da sua jornada, trabalho e aprendizado pelo open source, experiência trabalhando no Mootools, cultura de trabalho no Estados Unidos, Inglês no dia a dia e outros.
Fabio M. Costa twitter: https://twitter.com/fabiomiranda GoDaddy website builder: https://godaddy.com/websites/website-builder GoDaddy Jobs: https://careers.godaddy.com
